Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: eyeliner \eye"lin`er\ ([imac]"l[imac]`n[~e]r), n. a cosmetic powder of a dark tint, applied to the eyelid close to the base of the eyelashes to accentuate the eyes. Compare {eye shadow}. [PJC]
eyeliner n : makeup applied to emphasize the shape of the eyes
